page.title: 11A day in the life of P.Darby
page.content: I wake up at seven thirty and go downstairs for my breakfast.I have a bowl of Frosties and a cup of coffee. I then have a wash and get dressed. At a quarter to nine I set of for school.When I get there I play in the playground for five minutes until the bell goes.We have assembly for half an hour.Next we have an hour of handwriting.At twenty to eleven we have playtime.From eleven o'clock till twelve we all have Peak Maths, and then we have dinner.I have art until twenty past two, and then I have playtime again.From half past two till half past three I have computer.Then I go home.When I get home I get changed and watch T.V.I have my tea which is usually marmite sandwitches.At half eight I go to bed.
